line: ben is going to be in a tv commercial

well it is not for sure but umm we met this guy in the park who thought ben was really cute yknow which he is so umm anyhoo he uh he gave us his card and told us to bring him down for this commercial he is auditioning
this guy is like the biggest commercial casting director in town
ben takes one lousy walk in the park and gets an audition
i mean way to go ben
been in that park a million times and no one offered me an audition
we were just pushing ben on the swings
hey rach now that you are working at ralph lauren can you bring me back some of those polo shirts
i do not think if i feel comfortable stealing on my very first day
unwilling to steal from work interesting
besides if anybodys gonna get free stuff it is gonna be me
okay guys way to wish me luck
okay let us discuss rachels birthday
i say we throw a surprise party this weekend
whoa whoa but her birthday is not like for another month
yeah but if we throw her a party on her birthday then it is not a surprise
i think it is a great idea
yeah we could have a dinner party and just invite her close friends
we are having a surprise party for rachel
okay great so do you want to do it together
i would love to do it together
they are gonna do it together
what so i gotta shut it down now
all right i gotta take off
picking up ben then we are off to the big audition
it is gonna be weird to watch some actor pretending to be bens dad
weirder than watching his two moms make out
there is a dad in the commercial
yeah the dad and ben eat soup and pretend to enjoy it
whoa hey maybe go down there with ya and see if i can get an audition to play the dad
i mean who better to play bens father than his godfather
in they are gonna let me audition
it turns out that one of the casting ladies has actually seen me in a play so i steered clear of her
he is done tons of commercials
seen him in like sugar smacks playstation and that one for the phone company
in fact he was so good in that one he actually convinced me to switch phone companies
yeah well he is not gonna get this one
ben is way cuter than that kid
i mean look at him look at you
listen would not it be great though if i got to play bens dad
joey you look nothing like ben
i look more like him than you do
yknow i do not really know you well enough for you to do that
so it is down to these two nancy i know you like this one and i think i agree
well umm that one is pretty but uh i just i just love this fabric sorry
oh do not be sorry that is part of your job here to give your opinions and then i take credit for them kidding
she is kidding but do not ever disagree with her again
i do not know which one but i do know i need a cigarette
so what do you say we take a break we go outside and we will figure this out when we come back
oh no my dads a doctor and he would always tell me just horror stories about ghosts and goblins who totally supported the princesss right to smoke
and then they came back from smoking and they had made all of the decisions without me
it is like being punished for not having this disgusting poisoning habit
i mean what if this keeps happening
yknow they will they will be outside smoking making all the decisions and just be up in my office breathing my stupid clean air yknow
and then when the day comes when kim wants to promote one of us who do you think she is gonna pick
rachel you can go down there you do not have to smoke
just say you wanna get some fresh air
yeah or you can do the easy thing and smoke
hey rach you wanna get some coffee
yeah i wanna go to babe
oh wait i change my mind
okay let us talk about the party
all right that is a little sketch of the cake umm some sample menus umm yknow what i thought we would start out with tuscan style finger food and for music heres an alphabetized list of all my cds
highlighted the ones that would go really good with the food
what happened to the intimate dinner party
oh we are not doing that
so wow it looks like you took care of everything
i did not take care of everything there is there is plenty of things for you to do
ooh i get to be in charge of cups and ice
fine okay i will be in charge of cups and ice
wait a minute i can get ice at the restaurant
wait a minute are you doing joeys audition did not go so well
yeah ben got a second audition
yeah i had to teach ross my bit because i actually did not get a callback
you got a callback too did not you
hey rachel what are you doing out here
oh well it is kinda lonely up there so i just thought i would come out here and get some fresh air
nancy and i were talking about the fall collection
so anyway we really honey we are just smoking all over you
no no no we will move you just stay right there
so anyway i sent the designs over to ralph and he is very excited about the line
excuse me can i can i bum one of those
yknow what actually okay okay okay what is so funny over here
i thought you did not smoke
oh i thought you guys meant marijuana cigarettes yknow
yknow what i mean like dubbies
and i actually i thought to myself wow those guys are crazy
but no i actually smoke the regular ones all all the time
oh god this is so nerve wracking
how how do you do this
well unfortunately i do not get many callbacks so
is it a good sign that they asked us to hang around after the audition
okay uh we have narrowed it down to raymond ben kyle and joey
the rest of you thank you very much
i might actually get to play bens dad
yeah because you all have such different looks we are putting you with raymond and kyle with ben
so it will be either you two or you two
man this is gonna be kinda weird
no we we are gonna be like best friends that is why it is gonna be weird
oh oh i thought we were just talking
is it okay if i leave this stuff here til rachels birthday party
oh good because uh we got rachel 800 gallons of water
seriously that is a lot of cups
yeah well that is because monica put me in charge of cups and ice and monica is gonna rue the day that she put me in charge of cups and ice
yknow i rued the day once did not get a whole lot else done
okay time to bring up the rest of the cups
ross good uh glad you are here
i wanna talk to you about something
well been thinking about this whole commercial thing yknow me going up against ben the two of us competing and that cannot lead to anything good
so i think just gonna step aside
gonna tell them that i will not audition
wow uh joey that is that is great
you are you are gonna let me do this
this this is my career we are talking about here
i just said that so you would not let ben do it
look ross if anyone should step aside it should be ben
well i mean let me get the door first
it was his audition in the first place
you are like the uh tag a long dad
at least i care about his feelings
do you know how hard this is gonna be on him when he doesnâ€™t get it
and why would not he get it
have you seen what my kid can do
he he he eats tortilla chips
he he plays soccer with the cartoon tiger
are you saying your kid eats soup better than my kid
you just give him a spoon baby
i guess we will just see
because this commercial belongs to me and mitch
you are kids name is raymond
i went down there just like you said yknow
well well that is because i went down there and they were all smoking
this is actually the smell of success
okay there is something different though oh my god
you look happy and sick you smoked
i had to do it for my career
i wish i had smoked for my career
no well no it is not that bad yknow
i mean yeah my tongue feels a little fuzzy and these fingers sort of smell i actually feel like i can throw up
okay but you gotta push past this because it is about to get so good
i have to tell you you smell so smokey i have to get up
so we are decided no on plaid yes on pink
rachel did not you just light that
yeah i did but yknow what
i am really really trying to cut back yknow
actually been thinking about quitting lately
oh sure every sunday night telling myself quitting but every monday morning it is like
well then let us just quit
oh i never could do it
we can help each other out
we can get what are those those patches
we could be like the patch sisters
oh yknow we really should quit
my late husband gave me that lighter
joey ross is gonna be here any second would you mind watching ben for me while i use the ladies room
so you wanna be an actor huh
i gotta tell ya it is no picnic
drake remoray the next day you are eating ketchup right out of the bottle
okay raymond joey you are up
okay uh well let us try one
well this is noodle soup and uh been working with tomato
but that is okay no problem
yknow that is that is fine but the line is hmm soup
all right let us try one
i i can do it one more time
i thought we were the patch sisters
rachel we tried to quit but it was too hard
well yknow if you if you started smoking again you could have at least told me
come on give me one of those
that is why we did not tell you and we are not gonna drag you down with us
we are both so proud of how well you are doing
not gonna let you blow it
in fact if i catch you with a cigarette you are fired
so go on get out of here
go on i do not want you breathing this stuff
so you will come with me on the paris trip
and the thing that started it all the cup
great job with the cups pheebs
why do not you just go out with her
and did you notice the ice
everyone no ones eating my tuscan finger food because they are all filling up on phoebes snow cones
my birthdays not for another month
you guys this is so great
i mean it is so unexpected
i mean chandlers birthday is even before mine
i was in charge of cups
listen man uh sorry the audition did not go so well
well look ross you do not have to
it is not your fault i suck
i mean what kind of an actor cannot even say hmm noodle soup
maybe maybe you did not mess up your audition because you suck maybe you messed up because you care more about uh your godson
wait whoa whoa you lost me
i think on some level you you sabotaged your own audition so that ben would get the part
well you are way sounds a lot better than mine
it is not that a bad actor
no it is just ah i care so damn much about little ben that uh it was more important to see him succeed
so did did he get it
eh what are you gonna do
excuse me is uh rachel green here
i was supposed to meet her for lunch
oh she does not come down here any more
you can find her up on ten
